item.title: Hepatitis B: What parents should know about the virus and the vaccine
item.description: For decades, newborns in the U.S. have been given the hepatitis B vaccine. This could change. A CDC vaccine advisory panel may vote to end that routine vaccination. Here's what parents should know.
